amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-14 to require GAO to submit a report to the Committee on the Judiciary, U.S. Senate, and the Committee on the Judiciary, House of Representatives, analyzing the extent to which the new Section 922(t)(1)(B)(ii) of title 18, United States Code, added by the bill prevents firearms from being transferred to prohibited persons.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Levin (MI).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
